channel.title: Posts on Brian Schuth
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Brian Schuth

item.title: First Post
item.description: I expect to place short notes here, something of a public journal. I’m writing from Eastport, where the weather took a turn from the feverish to the sharply crisp on Thursday night. As I was struggling to sleep, the north wind suddenly rose up, sounding at first like a locomotive, or the shock wave from an explosion. When it became clear there was no fireball behind the breeze, but instead only colder air, I was able to drift off after wrapping myself more closely in my comforter.
